casebody.data:
MAHONING CTY. BAR ASSN.
v.
MCNALLY 2017-1743 Supreme Court of Ohio. November 21, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

Fischer and DeGenaro, JJ., not participating.

RECONSIDERATION OF PRIOR DECISIONS

On motion for reconsideration. Motion denied. Respondent's motion for stay pending motion for reconsideration denied as moot.

O'Donnell and Kennedy, JJ., would deny respondent's motion for stay pending motion for reconsideration.
